links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Moebius Function
mathematica: lst={}; Do[p=n-MoebiusMu[n]; If[PrimeQ[p], AppendTo[lst, p]], {n, 2, 1200}]; lst (from T. D. Noe)Select[Table[n-MoebiusMu[n],{n,1000}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 18 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) { n=0; for (m=1, 10^9, a=m - moebius(m); if (isprime(a), write("b062304.txt", n++, " ", a); if (n==1000, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 26 2001
